the chili took nearly all day | but i am sure it will be a hit .
everyone had a great time socializing as more and more guests arrived .
once everyone was here | we decided to light the candles on the cake .

output.sentences: They bought a case of wine for Joan's birthday party.
Her best friend made a huge pot of chili for the party.
All her friends showed up to surprise her for her birthday.
Joan was very surprised by the party.
